title: How to get Hulu on my Samsung Smart TV - Quora

response.answer_text: Go to the apps section by pressing the home button on the remote, Scroll over to Apps and do a search for Hulu, then install it and it should be placed on your home screen.
If Hulu is not already pre-loaded, just go into the Samsung Apps store, find it, and download it. https://help.hulu.com/s/article/download-hulu?language=en_US#samsung
